DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate combination heat moisture exchanger air force warm blanket warm intravenous fluid prevents intraoperative hypothermia obese non obese woman target control infusion-total intravenous anaesthesia ( TCI-TIVA ) low abdominal surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Heat Moisture Exchanger Combination With Air Forced Warming Blankets Warming Intravenous Solutions Intraoperative Hypothermia Prevention Obese Non Obese Patients During Intravenous Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: woman 1865 year old gynecologic obesity fever endocrine disease hypertension vasoactive drug
